verses.verse: Then I <S%H7725>turned<s%>, and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and behold a <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H4039>roll<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, What <S%H7200>seest<s%> thou? And I <S%H559>answered<s%>, I <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H4039>roll<s%>; the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof is <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> thereof <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto me, This is the <S%H423>curse<s%> that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%> over the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>: for every one that <S%H1589>stealeth<s%> shall be cut <S%H5352>off<s%> as on this side <S%H3644>according<s%> to it; and every one that <S%H7650>sweareth<s%> shall be cut <S%H5352>off<s%> as on that side <S%H3644>according<s%> to it. every one that stealeth: or, every one of this people that stealeth holdeth himself guiltless, as it doth

I will bring it <S%H3318>forth<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, and it shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1590>thief<s%>, and into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of him that <S%H7650>sweareth<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>: and it shall <S%H3885>remain<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> it with the <S%H6086>timber<s%> thereof and the <S%H68>stones<s%> thereof.

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me went <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> now thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> what is this that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%>, What is it? And he <S%H559>said<s%>, This is an <S%H374>ephah<s%> that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%>. He <S%H559>said<s%> moreover, This is their <S%H5869>resemblance<s%> through all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And, behold, there was lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H5777>lead<s%>: and this is <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H3427>sitteth<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H374>ephah<s%>. talent: or, weighty piece

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, This is <S%H7564>wickedness<s%>. And he <S%H7993>cast<s%> it into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H374>ephah<s%>; and he <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H68>weight<s%> of <S%H5777>lead<s%> upon the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> thereof.

Then lifted I <S%H5375>up<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, and <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and, behold, there came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>women<s%>, and the <S%H7307>wind<s%> was in their <S%H3671>wings<s%>; for they <S%H2007>had<s%> <S%H3671>wings<s%> like the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of a <S%H2624>stork<s%>: and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H374>ephah<s%> between the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> I to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> that <S%H1696>talked<s%> with me, Whither do these <S%H3212>bear<s%> the <S%H374>ephah<s%>?

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, To <S%H1129>build<s%> it an <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%>: and it shall be <S%H3559>established<s%>, and <S%H3240>set<s%> there upon her own <S%H4369>base<s%>.
